nodes.text: Bertos Goodner was a male dancer and commander of the Rebel spies on Naboo during the Galactic Civil War.

During 1 ABY, Bertos Goodner stood by the entrance of the Moenia spaceport on Naboo. Posing as a dancer, Bertos Goodner would offer to dance for traveling spacers who passed through the city. However, Bertos Goodner was in fact the commander of the Rebel spies on Naboo. During Bertos' time in Moenia, a Rebel spy named Simo Oron was detained by Imperial forces. C-3PO tasked a Rebel operative with obtaining his contact list from an Imperial base on Naboo, while the Rebellion made arrangements to rescue Simo. After the Rebel operative succeeded in finding the contact list, he handed it over to Bertos Goodner in Moenia.

Bertos Goodner is a non-player character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He is part of the "Rebel Themepark," a series of quests that players aligned with the Rebellion may take part in. For the quest, Rebel players must simply give Bertos a data disk. Bertos will offer to show a dance move, or explain a little bit about Moenia to players who do not partake in the "Rebel Themepark."
